    1. Kalafati, L., Hatzioannou, A., Hajishengallis, G. & Chavakis, T. The role of neutrophils in trained immunity. Immunol. Rev. 314, 142–157 (2022). A review discussing recent developments in the field of neutrophil-trained immunity and its context-dependent outcomes. - DOI - PubMed - PMC
